item.title: The B0ardside in The Million Dollar Mailbox
item.description: Ah, super lovely review of My Side Of The City and The B0ardside #1 from my buddy Dan Shahin .. This is taken from a longer livestream here. thanks Dan!

item.title: My Side Of The City
item.description: Finished a comic I’ve been working on this past year - over at the Drawing B0ard -
